title: 本週內會有活動商談明年廣告合約 要TVB食屎嘅唔該入黎

replies.msg:
今個禮拜TVB將會喺銅鑼灣營業部搞event招呼各大廣告商，據聞反應幾好，唔少廣告商都會出席。係呢個關鍵時期，我地一定要加強向廣告商施壓！要TVB下年食屎嘅唔該幫幫手！

各位marketing JJ注意，
TVB係品牌負資產，喺TVB落廣告，
你哋苦心經營嘅品牌形象將付諸流水！無人可憐！
TVB今個月開始同廣告客戶傾下年合約，Keep住個氣勢到年底啦！
廣告界多番強調，去FB洗版係有用ga



【點解搞雀巢？】

雀巢旗下能恩、Illuma、惠氏等各個奶粉品牌至今仍有TVB廣告，支持TVB繼續荼毒市民

原來，雀巢乃【奶粉界TVB】，一樣咁中意呃人
1. 母乳有多過150種低聚糖，Illuma落得1種，就呃人「貼近母乳」
2. 包裝標籤寫「不含雲尼拿味」，點知有落添加劑！加重BB代謝系統負擔！

連BB都唔放過，果然同TVB一樣黑心！

正所謂一不做二不休，既然雀巢一路唔撤TVB廣告，咁我地就罷買佢旗下全線產品，明確傳達我地香港人嘅立場！五大訴求，缺一不可！再唔撤budget，業績定仆直！盡快同TVB割席！

【抵制CCTVB 任務流程】
1.派嬲

2.洗版

3.罷買


是晚重溫@16 Oct 2019
雀巢
https://www.facebook.com/Nestle
https://www.facebook.com/nestleyoghurthk
https://www.facebook.com/NestleHealthScienceHK/
https://www.facebook.com/nestlebabyhk/
https://www.facebook.com/NestleCerealsHK/

請用幾秒去派嬲、留言、推post

俾幾秒我哋抵制TVB團隊得唔得?

※請善用template，清晰表達訴求
二擇其一，歡迎創意留言。
1️⃣
無綫新聞，助紂為虐，恥與為伍，撤回廣告！希望貴公司重新檢視你所僱用之廣告公司及其廣告計劃。貴公司有權選擇其他廣告公司，正如大眾同樣有權選擇你的競爭對手！
2️⃣
我本身好支持你哋公司嘅產品，奈何本人對貴公司於賣港媒體TVB落廣告此舉極為反感，決定罷買產品直至見唔到TVB 廣告為止。如果廣告部或者廣告公司hard sell 你買TVB，請考慮換咗廣告部同事或廣告公司！

歡迎大家用呢幅圖留言



記得bookmark: TVB廣告客戶名單！！
消費前諗清楚
http://bit.ly/2P7cPeD
－－－－－－－
請即follow:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/sayno2tvb
IG: #sayno2tvb
TG: https://t.me/sayno2tvb

replies.msg:
可以咁寫：
To Managing Director of Nestle:This is a message from HK.We see your company working and promoting very hard on relieving plastic pollution through packaging material reduction. We believe you have a good mind in saving our earth and people’s lives.On 15 Oct 2019 the US Congress has decided to support Hong Kong through passing the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act 2019. Sanctions will be imposed on those individuals responsible for abducting and torturing people for exercising internationally recognized human rights.TVB, well-known as the largest, most malicious and Chinese manipulated television broadcast company in HK, is famous in disseminating fake news. The CEO of TVB is on top of the sanction list.People in Hong Kong look down upon any company that still places advertisements and promotion strategies in TVB and would treat them as ‘Company that supports Tyranny’, of which we 100% disagree and will cease to buy any products from them. Recent boycott targeting at Starbucks, whose HK’s franchise is currently owned by Maxim’s (another devilish HK company that turns it back to the people of HK) could be a perfect example for your reference. We are afraid that the image of Nestle will perish like Starbucks if Nestle continues to cooperate with and financially support TVB.We believe you have a good mind in saving our earth and people’s lives. We will promote this message to all 7.8 million people in our city. People of Hong Kong love your Nescafe and chocolate bars, as much as hearing from Nestle that she supports basic human rights, freedom and democracy.#FightforFreedom#StandwithHongKong
